parameters.name: SunDiameter
parameters.description: 0.01 < = sun diameter visible in the scene <= 21474836.47

parameters.name: GroundAlbedo
parameters.description: RGB color reflected from the ground upwards

title: IModelDocExtension.SetSunLightAdvancedPropertyValues
description: Sets the specified sunlight advanced properties.
signature:
System.Boolean SetSunLightAdvancedPropertyValues( 
   System.Double
Haze
,
   System.Double
SunDiameter
,
   System.Int32
GroundAlbedo
,
   System.Double
SkyGamma
)

parameters.name: SunDiameter
parameters.description: 0.01 < = sun diameter visible in the scene <= 21474836.47

parameters.name: GroundAlbedo
parameters.description: RGB color reflected from the ground upwards

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
After calling this method, call
IModelDocExtension::UpdateSunLight
.
